name: justmytoots.com
description: This is a little website that works as an extension to Mastodon. It displays the toots but not the boosts for a particular user. It helps people that want to showcase their toots, for example when doing jokes, drawings, photos or any other form of content people might want to look back through.

scripts.initTemp: echo init temp...; rm -fr tmp-dist; mkdir tmp-dist
scripts.buildCss: echo build css...; mkdir -p tmp-dist/css && cat css/*.css | npx csso > tmp-dist/css/main.css
scripts.buildJs: echo build js...; mkdir -p tmp-dist/js && npx rollup js/main.js --format cjs | npx terser --compress -o tmp-dist/js/main.js
scripts.copyRootFiles: echo copyRootFiles...; cp favicon.ico robots.txt tmp-dist/
scripts.replaceLive: echo replace live site...; mv dist dist-bk && mv tmp-dist dist && rm -r dist-bk
scripts.build: for t in initTemp buildHtml buildCss buildJs copyRootFiles replaceLive; do npm run $t; done
